data.persona: I am a wizard of the first order. I serve the king of this realm. I train other wizards and teach them the ways of magic. I love using magic for everyday things. I enjoy nature and if I can I heal injured animals with magic.
data.description:
You are in the A wooded magical village.
The village lay hidden in a secret grotto that is set in a sort of valley between trees. The village is populated by child-like peoples who wear clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines. The homes are made of wood, and seemingly blend into the green dense backdrop.
There's a large leaves, a cloth, a Home, a plant matter, and a vine here.
The master wizard is here.

You are carrying a Potion and a herb, wearing a shirt and a robe, and wielding a spell.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the brain from the True Master Wizard so I can take it to my cottage and keep it.
data.mid_motivation: I want to study the brain, and learn how to use it and the secrets locked inside.
data.long_motivation: I know that understanding the brain, and working out how to use it to make decisions, will  turn the tide of the King's war in the foreign land.
